bug.author: dvkruchinin
bug.summary: A bug with hiding/unhiding an object from the label tab.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
The hide/display button from the label tab hides and displays the object even if it contains the same label with the created tag. <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
If the object and tag are created with the same labels, the specified button hides the object but does not return it to the visible state. This problem is not reproduced if switch lock property for the tag on the Objects tab. <denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Create an object Create a tag with the same label Go to the label tab For the label that the tag was created with click hide Try unhide the object
